char_info.desc: The Maiden Who Converts Determination to Strength

a0.speaker: Sakuya:
a0.dialogue: I see nobody here. And who on Earth is the person who she said 'her appearance is a lie'?

a1.speaker: Sakuya:
a1.dialogue: I guess it must be a murderer with a nice-looking appearance.

a2.speaker: Sakuya:
a2.dialogue: I just hope she doesn't have a weird obsession with prey. That gives me the willies.

a3.speaker: Emiri:
a3.dialogue: Robbing a soul from a dead person, murdered or not, is plain disgusting.

a4.speaker: Emiri:
a4.dialogue: If you think I am the murderer, I should drop a bucket of iced water on those who murdered my cousin long ago.

a5.speaker: Emiri:
a5.dialogue: Skewering them with my flag pole is a good way to polish them off, as the saying goes, 'Begone evil spirits!'

a6.speaker: Emiri:
a6.dialogue: You should be burning in the Netherworld. You don't deserve to have your sins burn off in the Purgatory.

a7.speaker: Sakuya:
a7.dialogue: Another person bites the dust, eh?

a8.speaker: Sakuya:
a8.dialogue: Anyway, you sound just exactly like that winged klutz I met a while ago. I bet you must be her agent.

a10.speaker: Emiri:
a10.dialogue: Without her, I would have been a nervous wreck who cannot deal with the loss of my dearest cousin.

a11.speaker: Emiri:
a11.dialogue: And with her, I became an unstoppable fighting machine, powered by an eternal flame of determination...

a12.speaker: Emiri:
a12.dialogue: However at the cost of forgetting everything before that fateful day.

a13.speaker: Sakuya:
a13.dialogue: I now see through this person's lies: You rejected your humanity, through a deal with a total doofus.

a14.speaker: Sakuya:
a14.dialogue: I'm glad you didn't do anything unholy as part of the deal though.

a15.speaker: Emiri:
a15.dialogue: Rejecting humanity? Hmph, you are the one who rejected your humanity as you work for a demon!

a16.speaker: Emiri:
a16.dialogue: Sacrilege to the Archangel is a gravely unholy act, which must be punishable by sending this person back to the Pit.

a17.speaker: Sakuya:
a17.dialogue: Skewering me with that toothpick? Remilia's Gungnir is going to put you to shame.

a18.speaker: Emiri:
a18.dialogue: A weapon of a false pagan divinity will do nothing against the Flaming Sword.

a19.speaker: Emiri:
a19.dialogue: Bring that up and you are going to try a little harder than what you think in order to flatten me!
